title: Goji (app)
text:
Goji was a <a href="location-based%20service">location-based</a> <a href="virtual%20keyboard">virtual keyboard</a>, created for <a href="IOS%208%23Keyboards">iOS 8</a> by <a href="The%20Last%20Guide%20Company">The Last Guide Company</a>. The keyboard enabled users to output recommendations for <a href="point%20of%20interest">places of interest</a> around them by tapping on an icon. The keyboard was released in October 2014 and removed from the <a href="iOS%20App%20Store">iOS App Store</a> when the company was closed in August 2015.
Goji would display a dynamic gradient background based on the current time of day and <a href="emoji">emoji</a> icons related to the <a href="Mobile%20device">mobile device's</a> current <a href="Location%20%28geography%29">location</a> and <a href="city">city</a>. For example, when on <a href="Apple%20Campus">Apple Campus</a>, <a href="Apple%20Inc.">Apple</a> specific icons would be shown.
